
```{r}
# load packages first
library(psydata)
library(BayesFactor)


funimagery %>% ggplot(aes(intervention, kg1))+ geom_point()

# use `formula = ` to tell ttestBF which data to use
# the tilda symbol, ~, means "is predicted by"
ttestBF(formula = weight_lost_end_trt ~ intervention, data=funimagery)
```
